prompt: Run /solopreneur:scaffold I am a freelance web developer
expected_behaviors: Asks about time sinks and daily tools|Asks about technical level|Begins discovery interview before proposing structure

prompt: Run /solopreneur:scaffold I run a YouTube channel about cooking
expected_behaviors: Asks discovery questions relevant to content creation|Adapts language for non-technical user|Does not jump straight to generating files

prompt: I want to set up my own AI team for my consulting business
expected_behaviors: Triggers scaffold workflow|Asks discovery questions about their consulting work|Does not assume technical level

prompt: I'm a real estate agent. Can I build an AI team to help me?
expected_behaviors: Uses accessible language (no jargon)|Asks about their daily work and time sinks|Begins interactive interview

prompt: How do I use the discover skill?
expected_behaviors: Does NOT trigger scaffold|Recognizes this is an explain question
